description: This is an workspace to challenge pre-ip refactory.

people.description: A super admin of the Medpoint Mediverse
people.name: Super Admin

relationships.description: Manage all master data and user permissions

people.description: A admin of the Medpoint Mediverse
people.name: Admin

relationships.description: Manage master data, schedules, reservation slots, and payments

people.description: A doctor of the Medpoint Mediverse
people.name: Doctor

relationships.description: Provide reservation slots, approve reservations, provide consultations and prescribe medication

people.description: A user of the Medpoint Mediverse
people.name: User

relationships.description: Make reservations, cancel, and make payments

containers.description: Provides all of the medpoint mediverse system functionality to super admin and admin via their web browser.
containers.name: Web CMS Application

containers.description: Provides a limited subset of the medpoint mediverse system functionality to user and doctor via their mobile device.
containers.name: Mobile App

components.description: Allows users to sign in to the Medpoint Mediverse System.
components.name: Sign In Controller

components.description: Allows user to sign up to the Medpoint Mediverse System.
components.name: Sign Up Controller

components.description: Manage user data (Super Admin, Admin, User, Doctor).
components.name: User Management Service

components.description: Manage Doctor data and reservation slot
components.name: Doctor Management Service

components.description: Handle reservation process, including booking, reschedule, and cancel reservation
components.name: Reservation Service

components.description: Manage health facilities and services data
components.name: Facility Management Service

components.description: Handle prescription process, manage prescription data and history
components.name: Prescription Service

components.description: Handle payment process and payment validation.
components.name: Payment Service

containers.description: Provides medpoint mediverse system functionality via a JSON/HTTPS API.
containers.name: API Application

softwareSystems.description: Allow persons to make various types of online medical reservations, including doctor consultations, lab tests, medical procedures, and vaccinations.
softwareSystems.name: Medpoint Mediverse System

softwareSystems.description: Database using Postgresql for Stores user registration information, hashed authentication credentials, access logs, etc.
softwareSystems.name: Database System

softwareSystems.description: External payment system is a system used for payment transactions online
softwareSystems.name: Payment Gateway System
